data.name: Phoenix Point - Corrupted Horizons DLC
data.detailed_description: A new deadly strain of the Pandoravirus appears that saps the will from every being it touches! This is a deadly threat to Phoenix, but can they make use of it against the Pandorans, as well? New enemies, a new soldier type, and new campaign missions.
data.about_the_game: A new deadly strain of the Pandoravirus appears that saps the will from every being it touches! This is a deadly threat to Phoenix, but can they make use of it against the Pandorans, as well? New enemies, a new soldier type, and new campaign missions.
data.short_description: A new deadly strain of the Pandoravirus appears that saps the will from every being it touches! This is a deadly threat to Phoenix, but can they make use of it against the Pandorans, as well? New enemies, a new soldier type, and new campaign missions.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10, 8 and 7 SP1+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10, 8 and 7 SP1+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.13 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.15 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro Vega 64

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Phoenix Point - Corrupted Horizons DLC

content_descriptors.notes: Phoenix Point contains depictions of science-fiction combat, including the use of guns, energy weapons, explosives, melee weapons, and other military-style devices. Phoenix Point also contains depictions of mutated humans and alien creatures that younger audiences may find disturbing.
